actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for an increase in the amount of the personal exemptions for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1973.

summary.text: Provides for an increase in the amount of the personal exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1973 from $750 to $1000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for an increase in the amount of the personal exemptions for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1973.
